item.description:
@dangerscape wrote:

Hi, i want know how to make item on item.
I want like Dragon armour set (l) use whit a needle that the Dragon armour set (l) go away and the needle not. But then i want dragon sq, med helm, legs, chain comes instead of the dragon armmour set (l).
ID is 15437.

Edit:

      if (itemUsed == 8701 && useWith == 15437) { //By I Vinnie I
                                    if(playerLevel[19] >= 0) {
				deleteItem(15437, getItemSlot(15437), 1);
				addItem(4087, 1);
				addItem(3140, 1);
				addItem(1149, 1);
				addItem(1187, 1);
				addItem(15352, 1);
                                    addSkillXP(150000000, 19);
				sendMessage("You have full dragon!");
			} else {
					sendMessage("You have full dragon!");
				}
			}
